snippet: The government says requirements to register drones will be simple enough that owners will not need to pay a “drone registration” company to do it for them.
abstract: Federal Aviation Administration says rules to register drones will be simple enough that owners will not need to pay drone registration company to do it.
lead_paragraph: The government says requirements to register drones will be simple enough that owners will not need to pay a “drone registration” company to do it for them.

headline.main: Drone Registration Expected to Be Simple, F.A.A. Says
headline.print_headline: Drone Registration Expected to Be Simple, F.A.A. Says
